description.line1: ShipStack lets you build production-grade SaaS apps by assembling modular blocks.
description.line2: Skip the setup. Forget boilerplate. Auth, billing, deployment‚Äîready out of the box.
description.line3: Focus on your product, we‚Äôll handle the rest.

framework.footer: ShipStack is built on the shoulders of giants

features.subtitle: ShipStack has built-in all the core components and functions of modern SaaS applications, allowing you to focus more on business logic and growth and accelerate the implementation of your SaaS applications.

modularByDesign.title: Modular by Design
modularByDesign.description: Build production-ready SaaS apps with modular, reusable blocks. Each module is composable and covers core features like auth, billing, and deployment‚Äîaccelerating delivery without starting from scratch.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered
aiPowered.description: AI-ready by design‚Äîseamlessly integrate with OpenAI, LangChain, and other leading frameworks. Build intelligent agents, recommendation engines, or automated workflows with ease, and extend freely as needed.

prebuiltAuth.title: Authentication system
prebuiltAuth.description: Built-in OAuth, Credentials authentication systems, support out-of-the-box Google and Github authorized login. Let you focus on business development without having to repeatedly build login and permission systems.

billing.title: Subscription & Billing
billing.description: Built-in Stripe module for subscriptions, invoicing, and tax automation. Supports multi-currency pricing, regional tax rules, and seamless billing flows‚Äîready to scale your SaaS business globally without custom integrations.

deployment.title: Seamless Deployment
deployment.description: Instant deployment with built-in CI/CD integration for Vercel and other platforms. Ship changes automatically with zero config‚Äîstreamlined delivery from code to production.

modernStack.title: Modern Tech Stack
modernStack.description: Powered by a modern frontend stack ‚Äî ChatGPT, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui and Magic UI for an exceptional developer experience and consistent design, right out of the box.

extensible.title: Customizable & Extensible
extensible.description: Fully customizable at the component and hook level‚Äîplug in event buses, custom APIs, or backend logic with ease. Built to adapt to complex, evolving product needs.

globalFirst.title: Global-First
globalFirst.description: Global-ready with built-in next-intl support‚Äîfeaturing localized routing, language switching, and content management. Deploy multilingual SaaS experiences effortlessly, anywhere in the world.

docsSdk.title: Comprehensive Docs & SDKs
docsSdk.description: Developer-ready documentation powered by Fumadocs, complete with detailed guides, code examples, and official SDKs. Everything you need to get started in minutes and build faster.

features2.heading: Core
features2.description: ShipStack helps you launch production-ready projects in minutes‚Äîwhether it's content, tools, or full-featured platforms.
features2.marketingLandingPageDescription: Launch visually compelling landing pages with modular layouts, gradient backgrounds, interactive animations, and i18n support‚Äîperfect for product launches and marketing campaigns.
features2.blogPlatformDescription: Includes markdown rendering, post management, tagging, full-text search, and multi-author support‚Äîideal for tech blogs, editorial hubs, or dev communities.
features2.aiPoweredSaaSToolsDescription: Easily build AI tools powered by OpenAI or LangChain with built-in subscriptions, usage tracking, and role control‚Äîgreat for AI writing, assistants, or retrieval systems.
features2.curatedDirectorySiteDescription: Quickly set up a curated directory with link cards, tag filters, theme toggles, and analytics‚Äîideal for tool lists, resource hubs, or product directories.
features2.membershipCommunityDescription: Built-in support for user login, access control, tiered permissions, and credit systems‚Äîideal for paid communities, private groups, or online course platforms. Modular components let you launch gated content, memberships, and user engagement tools in no time.

usageFlow.heading: SaaS Services
usageFlow.description: Accelerate your AI SaaS project in just a few key steps. From choosing templates to live deployment, ShipStack provides full modular support to help you build, launch, and iterate faster than ever.

steps.title: Download ShipStack Source Code
steps.description: Get the ShipStack codebase from GitHub, explore its modular architecture, and build a high-quality SaaS product tailored to your vision.

steps.title: Customize Your Project
steps.description: Easily modify template files in VS Code to fit your business needs‚Äîadjust components, styles, and logic with flexibility, enabling full customization from design to functionality.

steps.title: Deploy to Production
steps.description: Launch your project on Vercel in just a few clicks‚Äîcomplete with automatic domain setup, HTTPS, and CI/CD. No complex configuration needed. Preview changes, roll back versions, and ship faster with confidence.

stats.heading: Trusted by developers, proven by real numbers
stats.subheading: ShipStack is built for scale ‚Äî here‚Äôs the data that proves it.

description.starter: Essential tools to get you started.
description.growth: Everything in Starter, plus tools to grow faster.
description.enterprise: Everything in Growth, plus enterprise-grade support and scale.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Whether you're just getting started or scaling fast, we're here to support you every step of the way. Here are some common questions to help you get started with ShipStack.

items.question: What makes ShipStack different from other SaaS starters?
items.answer: ShipStack is not just a template ‚Äî it‚Äôs a production-ready SaaS system built with modular blocks, instant deployment, and prebuilt auth, billing, and more.

items.question: Can I use ShipStack for commercial projects?
items.answer: Absolutely. ShipStack is designed to help you launch real-world SaaS apps quickly and reliably.

items.question: Is it possible to customize modules?
items.answer: Yes. Every block in ShipStack is fully extensible and built for developer customization.

items.question: How is authentication handled?
items.answer: We use secure, prebuilt authentication flows with industry best practices out of the box.

items.question: Does ShipStack support multi-language apps?
items.answer: Yes, i18n is built-in using next-intl, ready to localize your SaaS app globally.

items.question: Is there documentation or support?
items.answer: Yes, you‚Äôll find comprehensive docs, code examples, and community support to help you build faster.

footer.description: Managing a small business today is already tough. ShipStack makes building SaaS easier.
